2.「……待たせちゃったかしら？| 急な お誘いだったのに| 来てくれて ありがとう: Did I keep you waiting? Thank you for coming|on such short notice, I'm so glad you could|make it.

3.「私……気球に乗るのが 夢だったのよ。| だから 期間限定で 気球に乗れるって聞: I've always dreamed of going on a balloon|ride. So when I heard that it was available|for a limited time, I made a reservation.

4.「それと 前から あなたと| のんびり 過ごしてみたかったから……| 一緒に ど: Also, I've always wanted to spend some quality|time with you, so I was wondering if you'd|like to join me.

6.<pc>と アンルシアは|気球に 乗り込んだ！: <pc> and Anlucia have boarded the balloon!

7.「おお そなた 無事だったか！| アンルシア姫も よくやってくれた！: Oh, you're safe! Princess Anlucia,|you did great!

8.「……ええ 危機一髪のところでした。| ルシェンダさまの おかげです。| けれど: Yes, it was a close call, thanks to you,|Lushenda. But... Pyuju got away.

9.「そうだ！ ルシェンダさま。| 彼女の荷物は 無事ですか？| ピュージュが 狙っ: Oh, right! Lushenda, is her luggage safe?|It looked like Pyuju was after it...

10.「荷物自体は 無事のようだが……| 何かを 盗られた 恐れがあるのか？| ならば: The luggage itself appears to be safe, but is|it possible that something was stolen?|If so, you may want to check it out.

12.<pc>の だいじなものの中から|時元神キュロノスが 落とした|戦禍のタネが な: The Evil War Seed dropped by Time God Kyuronos|was missing from <pc>'s Key Items!

13.「……なに？ 戦禍のタネだと？| それを 奪われたというのか。: ...What? An Evil War Seed?|That's what they took from you?

15.「……ふむ そうか。そなたたちには| 戦禍のタネについて 教えてなかったな。|: ...Hmm, right. I didn't tell you about the|Evil War Seed. Then I will tell you|what I know.

16.「ガートラントの事件を 覚えているか？| ピュージュが そっくりの偽者をあやつる:
Do you remember the incident in Gartlant? The|one in which Pyuju controlled lookalikes to|create chaos in the country by inciting|
|a civil war?

17.「私は ガートラント王国と 懇意にしていてな。| ピュージュが 事件を起こして以:
I am on friendly terms with the Kingdom of|Gartlant. Ever since the incident with Pyuju,|I've been secretly trying to find out what|
|he's up to.

18.「その結果…… ピュージュは どうやら| あるものを求めて 各地に 争いの火種を: As it turned out, Pyuju had been fanning the|flames of conflict throughout the land in|search of something. And that thing was...

20.「うむ。戦禍のタネは 魔瘴に関わる戦いにより| 生まれる 戦いの怨念と魔瘴が|: Yes. Evil War Seeds are said to be born from|battles involving miasma, and are ripened by|both miasma and the grudges of those battles.

21.「ピュージュは 人々をだまし 争いを起こしては| たくさんの戦禍のタネを 生みだ: It seems that Pyuju has been manipulating|people and causing conflicts to create and|gather Evil War Seeds.

22.「そんなことが あったなんて……。| でも ピュージュは なんのために……？: So something like that has been going on...|But what is Pyuju trying to do...?

23.「そういえば……地獄の扉が 開かれて| 災いが あふれ出す……と| ピュージュは: Speaking of which...Pyuju said that the doors|of hell would open, and disaster would|pour forth.

24.「……そして こうも言っていましたね。| これで 必要な分が そろった。| まも: ...He also said that all the pieces were in|place, and that his desires would soon be|fulfilled...

25.「……どうやら 事態は 切迫しているようだ。| これは 一刻も早く ピュージュか: ...It seems that the situation is becoming|more urgent. We must get the Evil War Seed|back from Pyuju as soon as possible...

29.「おお でかしたぞ！ スピンドル兵士長！: Oh, good work, Lead Soldier Spindle!

30.「ふふっ 我らの情報網にかかれば お手のモノ！| ２匹もいたとは 意外でしたが…: Heheh, nothing escapes our information|network! I wasn't expecting 2 of them... but|this time, we'll catch 'em for sure!

31.「ピュージュどもは ふた手に分かれ| 依然 海上を飛行しながら 逃走中です！|: The Pyujus have split up, and are currently|fleeing across the seas! One of them is headed|one of the uninhabited Wena Islands...

32.「もう一方の ピュージュは どうやら| ゲルト海峡の方角に 向かっているようです: And the other Pyuju is apparently heading in|the direction of Gert Strait!

35.「そなたは ゲルト海峡へと逃げた| ピュージュのほうを 追いかけるのだ。: And you will go after the Pyuju who has fled|to Gert Strait.

40.「ゲルト海峡に浮かぶ小島……ガミルゴの盾島では| 島に空いた 大きな穴を 石化し: The small island off Gert Strait... Gamilgo's|Shield Isle, is said to hold a petrified giant|that is blocking a great pit.

42.「術士ガミルゴは 他でもない 私の先祖でな。| なぜだか 無性に 胸騒ぎがするの: Gamilgo is, of all people, my ancestor.|That's probably why I feel so anxious.

43.「我が身に流れる 父祖の血が| 危機を知らせているような……。: It's as if the blood of my ancestor is trying|to warn me of danger...

44.「……くれぐれも 気をつけてくれ。| 武運を祈る。: ...Please proceed with caution.|I wish you good luck.

45.「あはは♪ もうすこしで……| あのお方の願いを かなえることができる♪| とっ: In just a little while I'll be able to grant|her wish, and something wonderful will happen!

|opening!

78.「……そうだな。| まず この魔界のことを 教えておこう。: Well...yes. First, let me tell you about this|Demon World.

85.「しかし 俺は お前を見て 使えると思ってな。| だから こうして 魔界に連れ帰: But when I saw you, I thought I could use you.|That's why I brought you back to Demon World|and made a blood pact with the Demon Tribe.

90.「……どこへ行くか だと？| しもべのお前が 気にすることではない。: Where do you think you're going? It's not your|concern, servant.

I have no choice but to tell you. We're going|to the north side of Gerhena Field to the|Demongate. I'll explain to you what's going to|
|happen there.

96.「ちゃんと ここまで 来られたか。| あれが魔仙卿が住む デモンマウンテンの入り: Did you make it this far? That is the entrance|to Demon Mountain where Oracle resides, the|great Demongate. Come this way.

|between the Great Demon King and the source of|darkness.

101.「……ゲッファッファ！！ バカヤロウ！！| 次の 大魔王になんのはァ オレ様ァ|: ...GEFFAFFA!!!! You idiot! The next Great|Demon King will be... Killer Grevos, of|course!

103.「……オレ様に アイサツしねえとは 何様だァ？| 名を聞けば 魔王すらも 恐れる: Who do you think you are, that you don't treat|me with respect? You know that even the Demon|King is afraid of Killer Grevos?

I'm sorry to interrupt. As you have heard, I|am a servant of the Demon King of Farazard. I|am working to make my Lord the Great Demon|
|King.

|other Demon King qualifiers.

|present.

|Fortress Valdista.

117.「だが 彼らは 大魔王の座に興味がないのか| 一向に この大審門に 現れる気配が: However, they are not interested in the throne|of the Great Demon King, and show no sign of|appearing at this Great Demongate.

118.「ゼクレスと バルディスタの魔王に会って| ここ 大審門へと 引きずり出す。|: I will meet Zechres and the Demon King of|Valdista and drag them here to the Great Demon|Gate. That is my mission.

119.「……ところで お前。| どうも その魔族の姿が 気に食わんようだな。: By the way, you. By the way, you don't seem to|like the appearance of that demon.

120.「残念ながら 一度 血の契約を交わし| 魔族の姿へと 変わった者は 二度と| 元:
Unfortunately, once a person has entered into|a blood contract and transformed into a demon,|they can never return to their original form.|
|That's the Demon World's way.

121.「……だが たったひとりだけ| 魔族となったお前を 元に戻しうる者がいる。| こ: ...There's only one person who can change you|back from your demon form... and that's|the Oracle that lives beyond this gate.

122.「ということは……大審門を開けるという| 俺の目的を果たせば 元の姿に戻るという: In other words...if I achieve my goal of|opening the Demongate, you'll reach your goal|of getting back to normal.

123.「……どうだ。お前にとっても 悪くない話だろ。| どの道 しもべに 選択肢などな: ...How about it? It's not a bad deal for you.|But since you don't really have a choice as a|servant, I expect you to work hard for me.

124.「ゲルヘナ幻野の東には 魔王アスバルがいる| ゼクレス魔導国…… 西に向かえば|: To the east of Gerhena Field is Zechres, home|to Demon King Asbal... and to the west is|Demon King Valeria's Fortress Valdista.

125.「２国のうち どちらからでも かまわない。| お前に 好きなほうを選ばせてやる。: I don't care which of the 2 nations will be|first. I'll let you decide that. Now then,|shall we begin your tour of the Demon World?

127.「ほら 見て！| 大風車塔が もう あんなに遠くに！: Look, look! The Great Windmill Tower is|already so far away!

128.「……ねえ。| 思えば 私たち 一緒に| たくさんの冒険を してきたわよね。: Hey... Thinking back, we've had many|adventures together, haven't we?

129.「いろいろと つらいことも あったけれど| あなたが いてくれたから| いつも: There have been many hard times, but because|of you, I have always been able to get through|them.

132.「……あなたにとって 私との関係は| 勇者と盟友…… だけなのかな？| それとも: To you, is my relationship with me only that|of a Hero and an ally? Or... do you think I'm|someone special|<select_nc>|Someone special|Hero and Ally|<select_end>|<case 1>|<close>|<case 2>|<close>|<case_cancel>|<close>|<case_end>

135.「そう…… そうなのね。| な…なんだか てれちゃうわね。: I see... I see. I'm kind of teetering.

136.「まさか あなたも 同じ気持ちで| いてくれたなんて……うれしいわ。: I can't believe you feel the same way...it's|nice to know.

138.「あはは！ そんなワケ ないでしょ！| こんな冗談に 本気になっちゃうなんて|: Ha-ha-ha! No, of course not! You're so stupid|to take this joke so seriously!

141.「間に合って よかったわ！: Thank God you made it in time!

142.「私の姿に 化ける者よ！| 正体を 見せなさいっ！！: You who take the form of me! Show me who you|really are!

143.「……あはは♪| ホンモノが 来ちゃったなら 仕方ないな～♪: If the real one came, I can't help it~

146.「やあやあ！ 盟友くん ひさしぶり～♪| 旅芸人ピュージュの ドッキリショーは|: Hey there! Hello, ally! I hope you enjoyed|Minstrel Pyuju's surprise show!

147.「あなたが…… ガートラントで| 陰謀を仕掛けたという ピュージュ……！: Pyuju, that you... conspired in Gartlant...!

148.「あはは♪ 勇者姫は はじめましてだね！| 知ってもらえてるなんて 光栄だな～♪: It's nice to meet you, Hero princess! I'm so|honored that you know me~~~ and that you ran|here to meet me.

149.「でもでも 残念ながら……| もう キミたちに 用はないんだよな～♪: But alas... we have no more use for you...

150.「ボクたちの目的は そこの彼女が| 気球に乗る前に 置いてってくれた| 荷物の中: Our purpose was in the luggage she left for us|before our Balloon ride....

151.「えっ ふたり いる……？| どういうこと……！？: There's two? What do you mean?

152.「あはは♪ これで 必要な分がそろったんだ！| ボクらの大願が まもなく かなう: Ha-ha-ha... now we have everything we need!|Soon our big dream will come true and then|something really scary will happen...

153.「……地獄の扉が 開かれて| 恐ろしい 災いが あふれ出すよ♪| きっと たくさ: The gates of hell will open and a terrible|plague will pour forth... and there will be|much bloodshed.

154.「……なかなか 楽しかったよ♪| それじゃ バイバ～イ！: ...it was a lot of fun......so bye~bye!

156.「……ところで。| あなた すっかり だまされていたようだけど| 偽者の私……何: By the way. You were totally fooled by me, the|imposter...did I say something weird?<yesno><close>

158.「……えっ そうなの。| 私を 特別な人と 思っているのか……って| 聞かれたの: Oh, yeah. You asked me if I thought I was|special. Hmm...

160.「ううん。やっぱり いい！| 今のは 聞かなかったことにして！: No problem. I knew it! Pretend you didn't hear|that!

161.「……ごめんなさい。| 今は こんな話 してる場合じゃなかったわね。: I'm sorry. Now is not the time to talk about|this.

162.「じつは 私が出かけてる時 ルシェンダさまから| あなたが 危ないという 連絡が: As a matter of fact, while I was out, I got a|call from Lady Lushenda that you were in|danger. I rushed over.

163.「下で ルシェンダさまが 待っておられるわ。| いったん 戻りましょう。: Lushenda is waiting for us downstairs. Let's|go back downstairs.

164.「魔界には 現在| 特に大きなチカラを持った ３つの国がある。: In Demon World, there are currently three|nations with particularly great power.

165.「魔界で最も古き 悪意の都 ゼクレス魔導国。: Zechres, the most ancient and malevolent city|in Demon World.

175.……しかし しばらく 見つめていたら|不思議と 文字の意味が わかるようになった: But after staring at it for a while, I began|to understand the meaning of the letters.|<pc> read the inscription.

176.「……じつは ふたりほど 心当たりがある。: I have two such cases in mind.

178.「ボクたちの目的は そこの彼が| 気球に乗る前に 置いてってくれた| 荷物の中に: Our purpose was in the luggage he left for us|before our Balloon ride....

179.「そうだ！ ルシェンダさま。| 彼の荷物は 無事ですか？| ピュージュが 狙って: Yes! Lady Lushenda. Is his luggage safe? It|looked like Pyuju was after it, but...

180.「ねえ！ いいこと 思いついたよ～♪| 彼のむくろを この儀式の 供物にしよう♪: Hey! I've got a great idea... we're going to|make an offering of his molars in this|ceremony.
